bands.name: Band 1.1
bands.description: Killing of a child (16 years old or under); killing of two or more persons; killing of a police officer, prison officer or equivalent public servant in the course of their duty; killing of a patient in a medical or nursing care context; corporate manslaughter; manslaughter by gross negligence; missing body killing.

categories.name: Murder
Manslaughter
Corporate Manslaughter
Conspiracy to commit murder
Child destruction
Infanticide

bands.name: Band 1.2
bands.description: Killing done with a firearm; defendant has a previous conviction for murder; body is dismembered (literally), or destroyed by fire or other means by the offender; the defendant is a child (16 or under).

categories.name: Murder
Manslaughter
Conspiracy to commit murder
Murder
Conspiracy to commit murder
Soliciting to commit murder
Manslaughter

bands.name: Band 2.1
bands.description: Terrorist murder (S63B Terrorism Act 2000); Explosive Substances Act 1883 offences â€“ especially S2&3; preparation for terrorism, S5 Terrorism Act 2000, disseminating terrorist publications, S2 Terrorism Act 2006; possession of material for the purpose of terrorism, S57 Terrorism Act 2000.

bands.name: Band 3.1
bands.description: Attempted murder of a child, two or more persons, police officer nursing/medical contact or any violent offence committed with a live firearm.

categories.name: Attempted murder
Causing or Allowing Death of Child or Vulnerable Person
Attempted murder
Maliciously administering poison, etc, so as to endanger life or inflict grievous bodily harm

bands.name: Band 3.4
bands.description: All other serious violence (unless standard, or specified in Band 3.5).
